Use the "Remove Borders" template option to remove the region''s borders and shadows.' ,p_null_text=>'Default' ,p_is_advanced=>'N' ); wwv_flow_api.create_template_opt_group( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(10207445497271457) ,p_theme_id=>42 ,p_name=>'BODY_PADDING' ,p_display_name=>'Body Padding' ,p_display_sequence=>1 ,p_template_types=>'REGION' ,p_help_text=>'Sets the Region Body padding for the region.' ,p_null_text=>'Default' ,p_is_advanced=>'N' ); wwv_flow_api.create_template_opt_group( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(10210281163271459) ,p_theme_id=>42 ,p_name=>'TIMER' ,p_display_name=>'Timer' ,p_display_sequence=>2 ,p_template_types=>'REGION' ,p_help_text=>'Sets the timer for when to automatically navigate to the next region within the Carousel Region.' ,p_null_text=>'No Timer' ,p_is_advanced=>'N' ); wwv_flow_api.create_template_opt_group( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(10211036744271460) ,p_theme_id=>42 ,p_name=>'BODY_HEIGHT' ,p_display_name=>'Body Height' ,p_display_sequence=>10 ,p_template_types=>'REGION' ,p_help_text=>'Sets the Region Body height. You can also specify a custom height by modifying the Region''s CSS Classes and using the height helper classes "i-hXXX" where XXX is any increment of 10 from 100 to 800.' ,p_null_text=>'Auto - Default' ,p_is_advanced=>'N' ); wwv_flow_api.create_template_opt_group( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(10212223202271461) ,p_theme_id=>42 ,p_name=>'ACCENT' ,p_display_name=>'Accent' ,p_display_sequence=>30 ,p_template_types=>'REGION' ,p_help_text=>'Set the Region''s accent.
